018package org.kordamp.maven.checker.cli;
019
020import picocli.CommandLine;
021
022import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.io.PrintStream;
025import java.net.URL;
026import java.util.Enumeration;
027import java.util.ResourceBundle;
028import java.util.jar.Attributes;
029import java.util.jar.Manifest;
030
031/**
032 * @author Andres Almiray
033 * @since 1.1.0
034 */
035public class Versions implements CommandLine.IVersionProvider {
036    private static final ResourceBundle bundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle(Versions.class.getName());
037    private static final String POMCHECKER_VERSION = bundle.getString("pomchecker_version");
038
039    @Override
040    public String[] getVersion() throws Exception {
041        ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
042        banner(new PrintStream(baos));
043        return baos.toString().split("\n");
044    }
045
046    public static void banner(PrintStream out) {
047        Manifest manifest = findMyManifest();
048        if (null != manifest) {
049            String version = manifest.getMainAttributes().getValue(Attributes.Name.IMPLEMENTATION_VERSION);
050            String buildTimestamp = manifest.getMainAttributes().getValue("Build-Timestamp");
051            String buildRevision = manifest.getMainAttributes().getValue("Build-Revision");
052            boolean additionalInfo = isNotBlank(buildTimestamp) || isNotBlank(buildRevision);
053
054            out.println("------------------------------------------------------------");
055            out.println("PomChecker " + version);
056            out.println("------------------------------------------------------------");
057            if (additionalInfo) {
058                if (isNotBlank(buildTimestamp)) {
059                    out.println("Build timestamp: " + buildTimestamp);
060                }
061                if (isNotBlank(buildRevision)) out.println("Revision:        " + buildRevision);
062                out.println("------------------------------------------------------------");
063            }
064        } else {
065            out.println(POMCHECKER_VERSION);
066        }
067    }
068
069    private static Manifest findMyManifest() {
070        try {
071            Enumeration<URL> urls = Versions.class.getClassLoader().getResources("META-INF/MANIFEST.MF");
072            while (urls.hasMoreElements()) {
073                URL url = urls.nextElement();
074                Manifest manifest = new Manifest(url.openStream());
075                if (manifest.getMainAttributes().containsKey(Attributes.Name.IMPLEMENTATION_TITLE)) {
076                    String specificationTitle = manifest.getMainAttributes().getValue(Attributes.Name.IMPLEMENTATION_TITLE);
077                    if ("pomchecker-cli".equals(specificationTitle)) {
078                        return manifest;
079                    }
080                }
081            }
082        } catch (IOException e) {
083            // well, this sucks
084        }
085
086        return null;
087    }
088
089    public static boolean isBlank(String str) {
090        if (str == null || str.length() == 0) {
091            return true;
092        }
093
094        for (char c : str.toCharArray()) {
095            if (!Character.isWhitespace(c)) {
096                return false;
097            }
098        }
099
100        return true;
101    }
102
103    public static boolean isNotBlank(String str) {
104        return !isBlank(str);
105    }
106}
